summary: Senegal is a country in West Africa, located on the Atlantic Ocean. It borders Mauritania, Mali, Guinea, and Guinea-Bissau. The capital is Dakar, and the official language is French, though Wolof is the most commonly spoken language. Senegal gained independence from French colonial rule and is known for its political stability. It has a diverse population of around 18 million people, with the largest ethnic groups being Wolof, Fula, and Serer. The majority of Senegalese people are Muslim. Senegal's economy relies on agriculture, mining, tourism, and services.
title: Senegal
